item.title: ::switch
item.dc:creator: @redrover redrover
item.description:
@redrover wrote:

You also can do something with this

public void ConvertMagic() {
NpcDialogue = 0;
NpcDialogueSend = false;
stillgfx(435, absY, absX);
RemoveAllWindows();
 if (ancients == 1) {
  setSidebarInterface(6, 1151); //magic tab (ancient = 12855);
  ancients = 0;
  sendMessage("The dark mage converts back to normal magic!");
 }  else {
  setSidebarInterface(6, 12855); //magic tab (ancient = 12855);
  ancients = 1;
  sendMessage("The dark mage converts you to ancient magicks!");
 }
}

Read full topic

item.title: ::switch
item.dc:creator: @kiwon kiwon
item.description:
@kiwon wrote:

[quote=“Deformed, post:2, topic:164253”]Lol, not only can you not code, you can’t use a brain…Simply search for the code to add an Extra magic tab in clan chat spot and then set the voids.[/quote]lmfao

yeah thats very helpful

dont be giving me crap “you cant code”

lmfao

lemme see ur server

n00b

ill bet my server owns urs

[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 12, 2007, 08:36:03 PM[/size][hr][quote=“TupacScape Owner, post:3, topic:164253”]Open up ur Client.txt/java
find

if (command.startsWith

Copy and put this in ur client:

if (command.startsWith("switch")) { NpcDialogue = 0; NpcDialogueSend = false; animation(435, absY, absX); RemoveAllWindows(); if (ancients == 1) { setSidebarInterface(6, 1151); // magic tab (ancient = 12855); // /normal = 1151 ancients = 0; sendMessage("You convert to normal magic!"); } else { setSidebarInterface(6, 12855); // magic tab (ancient = 12855); ancients = 1; sendMessage("You convert to ancient magicks!"); } }
And everytime when you do the commands ::switch
it’s switch the magic tab to ancient/normal

G-Yiffa[/quote]will all the magic work?

im using devolution 6.0

Read full topic

item.title: ::switch
item.dc:creator: @TupacScape_Owner TupacScape Owner
item.description:
@TupacScape_Owner wrote:

Open up ur Client.txt/java
find

if (command.startsWith

Copy and put this in ur client:

if (command.startsWith("switch")) { NpcDialogue = 0; NpcDialogueSend = false; animation(435, absY, absX); RemoveAllWindows(); if (ancients == 1) { setSidebarInterface(6, 1151); // magic tab (ancient = 12855); // /normal = 1151 ancients = 0; sendMessage("You convert to normal magic!"); } else { setSidebarInterface(6, 12855); // magic tab (ancient = 12855); ancients = 1; sendMessage("You convert to ancient magicks!"); } }
And everytime when you do the commands ::switch
it’s switch the magic tab to ancient/normal
